newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.033pts to 99.694.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.033pts to 99.694.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds fell 0.033 points on Friday to 99.694, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio fell by 0.003 points to 2.487 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, lost 0.034 points to 95.935 points, the bank said, while the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.423 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 rose 0.880 points to 1,198.240.
